name: Flooded Courtyard
description: A once-beautiful courtyard now lies underwater, creating a unique aquatic environment. The underwater ruins can hide valuable artifacts and create unique exploration challenges, while the water can provide food and transportation opportunities.
atmosphere: Once-beautiful courtyard now lies beneath still waters like drowned garden. Air carries water, old stone, and underwater treasures scent. Footsteps echo through chambers that now ripple with water. Skin tingles with sense of underwater ruins and valuable artifacts. Taste of aquatic mystery and lost beauty fills mouth. Weight of flooded beauty and exploration challenges presses down on you.
